item.title: Specifications
item.description: Chilli oil 200g canola oil 25g gochugaru 15g crushed chilli flakes 2 tsp fennel seed 1 tsp Sichuan peppercorn, crushed 2 star anise 1 black cardamom 2 coin sized pieces of ginger 2.5g salt 2.5g MSG Combine all ingredients apart from the oil in a heat-proof bowl. Heat oil to 200C. Let cool to 140C, then pour over the oil, stirring. Chinese spare ribs 1kg pork ribs 2 star anis 5cm piece of cinnamon 1 inch ginger, diced A similar amount of garlic, diced 1 small onion, diced 4 dried red chilli, seeds removed 2 tbsp sugar 2 tbsp hoisin 2 tbsp oyster sauce 1 tbsp soy 2 tbsp rice vinegar Sear ribs Cook down the solid ingredients Add sauce ingredients, and add water to just cover Pressure cook for 40 mins Release heat, reduce sauce if needed
